Ingest supplements: Vitamins and minerals can be obtained through dietary supplements. These supplements are designed to provide the body with the necessary nutrients to maintain optimal health.

Ingest animal products: Animal products such as meat, fish, and dairy products are good sources of essential vitamins and minerals. These nutrients can be obtained through the consumption of these products.
Ingest fortified foods: Many foods on the market today are fortified with essential vitamins and minerals. These nutrients can be obtained through the consumption of these foods.
Ingest herbal supplements: Herbal supplements are made from natural ingredients and can provide the body with essential vitamins and minerals.

Ingest functional foods: Functional foods are designed to provide specific health benefits. They are often fortified with essential vitamins and minerals and can be a good alternative to traditional foods.
